_sText: This made was made by me. I have changed my name into MrMuffin as my old account for gamebanana doesn't work anymore so i thougt i would make a new submission on this account.

This is one of my maps. Its an mg map with the theme of super smash bross brawl.
The objetive is to get out of the battle zone all of the enemis
My 1. map ^^

UPDATE:
Recently, I have checked and if I am correct, it now seems that downloads are working properly. ;)

INFORMATION ON THE MAP (mg_spy_arena_v1)
----------------------
There is only 1 CT who is the spy. His aim is to completely wipe out the Ts located in the warehouse and only has 2 minutes to do so.
He spawns with a knife which is also invisible. To help him elimate all the Ts, he has 7 specials which he can select.

Button 1: Grants him with a glock only containing 1 clip
Button 2: Granting him with 1 nade.
Button 3: Switches off the lights in the warehouse (see image 2).
Button 4: Adds 1 minute onto the round.
Button 5: Grants him with 2 flashes.
Button 6: Grants him with a smoke grenade.
Button 7: Grants him access to the medic room only once. 

If the spy manages to elimate all the Ts, then the next round starts.
If the spy fails to kill all the Ts in the round time, a blast door will start to open with an alarm. Behind the blast door are 10 paras which the Ts use to find and elimate the spy.

--------------------

Image 1 shows CT spawn. The part in the middle of the room is the teleporter which will transport the spy into the arena (images 2,3,4).

Image 2 shows what the warehouse looks like if the spy decides to switch off the lights.

Image 3 shows the view from the Ts. They start with no weapons.

Image 4 shows an overview shot of the warehouse (arena).

This is my new release. Was originally made for another clan, but the clan died out, and yea, I just had it lying around..

The map is a course map, with some easy and some hard obstacles. Made for a decent minigame player.
It has more than enough spawns. (Don't remember exact, but I remember it was more than 32 at least.)

In the end, all other players are slayed, except the winner. The winner can then choose between three prizes. 1: Invisibility all next rounds. 2: many points. 3: many points and teleport to a longjump bonus. If the player can do the longjump bonus, he is rewarded with even more points.

Thanks :)

________________________________________________________________________________

I made this map based off of the multiplayer of Splinter Cell: Double Agent. The Ts are the spies and are trying to steal the "intel" from the CTS. The Ts have 5 mins to do this.

***Spies***

- Smoke grenade
- Spy suit (black)
- Night vision goggles
- Low grav (80%)
- Health Regeneration
- USP
- Partly invisible
- Body Armour

***CTs***

- USP
- MP5
- 150 HP
- Grenade
- Body Armour

The spies have to first steal the keycard that's in a conference room, and then bring the keycard to the vault door. Then they have to take the briefcase from the vault and bring it back to their spawn.


- Generator: Found in back of basement and when the button to it is shot, all the lights will shut off for 60 seconds.

- 2 Splinter cell songs 

***PICTURES***

 1. Lobby of building
 2. Conference room (keycard in middle)
 3. Bathroom
 4. T spawn
 5. Intel/Inside of vault
 6. Layout of map

________________________________________________________________________________

***FIXES FOR V2***

 - Change briefcase to brushes
 - CTs get MP5s instead of UMPs
 - CTs get grenades
 - CTs don't get night vision goggles
 - The generator can only be shot out once
 - Everyone gets body armour
 - Added weapons scattered around the map
 - Music is louder
 - Other small stuff

________________________________________________________________________________

I've changed they system so that you drop the bomb into a hole to open the vault and end the round. This should fix  it from being so glitchy.
________________________________________________________________________________


HOPE YOU LIKE IT!

IF I HAVE NOT CREDITED YOU FOR ANY TEXTURES YOU CREATED, PLEASE MESSAGE ME OR LEAVE A COMMENT BELOW.
________________________________________________________________________________
THIS IS NOT AN UPDATED VERSION FROM THE EARLIER SPLINTERCELL MAP, IT IS A COMPLETLY NEW MAP STARTED FROM SCRATCH.
________________________________________________________________________________

I made this map based off of the multiplayer of Splinter Cell: Double Agent. The Ts are the spies and are trying to steal the "intel" from the CTS. The Ts have 5 mins to do this.

***Spies***

- Smoke grenade
- Spy suit (black)
- Night vision goggles
- Low grav (80%)
- Health Regeneration
- USP
- Partly invisible
- Body Armour

***CTs***

- USP
- MP5
- 150 HP
- Grenade
- Body Armour

The spies have to first steal the keycard that's behind the front desk, and then bring the keycard to a room on the second floor. Then they have to take the briefcase from that room and bring it back to their spawn.


- Generator: Found in back of basement and when the button to it is shot, all the lights will shut off for 60 seconds.

- 2 Splinter cell songs 

- Armour in basement (has to be unlocked from a room on the first floor).

- Secret deagle which makes anyone carrying it 100% invisible

________________________________________________________________________________

HOPE YOU LIKE IT!

This is version 2 of mg_speed, it is easier to make the jump and has 2 ramps to surf on, on each side and 3 teleporters. Awp is added (Only pros can kill with it....and bots, they own in this once they manage to pick the knife up. You also have to add the bot and load the .nav yourself.)

This version is like I said, easier for the people who thought V1 was too hard. (v1 = pro)

This map requires SKILL, people on their first try, pick up the knife and fall off first jump.

As i said before, this map is fast paced and when you pick up the knife infront of where you spawn, you get pushed with epic speed.

AIM HIGHER TO GO HIGHER

AIM LOWER TO GO LOWER, don't aim down unless your pro, other wise you will get owned by the ground! >:O

Music: Flying Fenix by Lit Fuse Films

Enjoy!



EDIT:
I have made the push blocks that you get pushed by, smaller, so other players do not get pushed away when proceeding to knife for the kill.

MG SPECIAL DELIVERY BY UNREAL Counter-terrorists have to destroy all terrorists inside the crates within 2 minutes. Terrorists must try to escape, until the game ends. [ NEW VERSION ] 100% Compatible with OB update CHANGES (version 7): [+] No more hard spots; [+] Fixed scout drop, that would make possible for CTs to have their scout when the game is over [+] Fixed chat spam [+] Fixed bug that would only give weapons to one terrorists in the end [+] Fixed weird bug that caused server to crash when picking a crate in the end [+] Removed all knives/crates on game end [+] Unlimited health for counter-terrorists during the game, terrorists can still pickup scouts but can't kill counter-terrorists. [+] Added more detail [+] Added instructions on counter-terrorists spawn [+] Added more spawnpoints (24 terrorists / 18 counter-terrorists) [+] Adapted to SourceMod I hope you like this new version, its WAY MORE STABLE, and no bugs were found untill now.

Its a mini game where you use oldschool weapons to kill your enemies. Can be played as a free for all since you can use the weapons against your teammates, or could be team battles. The weapons include a spear a sword and a bow all work and move with you. I created all the weapons from scratch myself if you do take them at least give me credit especially since the bow was a bit tricky to make. [IMPORTANT-To fire the bow just press e on the string fire it as many times as you want, if experienced can be the most powerful weapon there.] Just a funny little map to joke around with. If you like the map please leave a comment so in the future I know to release more of this stuff I've made just sitting on my comp thanks. (no custom files included so no worries about that)
7v7 teams or 14 free for all

You get spawned on a platform with your usually weapons. You have to survive for a certain amount of time. If you survive that time you loose your weapons and get teleported to the space and lava room. You get a knife with a thruster that spews out brown smoke, it looks like fart, also low gravity there. You have to jump over the rocks to get the grenades and the Flashbang. Also the grenades and the flashbang have env_spritetrails on them!! (they leave trails of light on them)

Multigames map designed to be like world of everyone's favorite hedgehog. There are some similarities with 4all_multigames, because this supposed to be csgo version of it, but I went further this time. You won't find 50 levels of original mingames packed into one multigame, there are plenty of such maps... ### This one is different: - No dev "one texture to rule them all" textures - No simple design - No crazy minigames, here you run, jump or fight - as Sonic would do - Each zone can be started with different settings - HP, weapon, difficulty (as you know it from 4all) - In every zones there are several rings to collect (each giving you one "kill" score)
### Also featuring: - Classic Sonic music - Beautiful world not unlike that of the Sonic games - and many other minor "Sonic elements"

This is my final version of this map!

What has changed?

Nothing much, Just fixed a few things and added 2 new areas! They are called slide race and a little obstacle course and ofcourse as this is a mini game map it's all about who is the fastest!

Have fun everyone I won't be adding anything else to this map I'm problably gonna start working on a new map with new content!

Please let me know if any textures are missing so I can fix it quick!

v4 added.

Added a no music version, fixed jump rope and edited a few things.

EDIT: Fix version added!

Fix of my first obstacles/race map created into Portal-like form. You must overcome all the obstacles created by GLaDOS before your opponents. Then, just YOU choose the end.

Contains:
- 9 middle-difficulty levels
- 3 types of end
- settings room
- easter egg (radio)
- good feeling of victory over rivals

What is new?:
- Radio with portal radio song
- the favourite portal song in settings room
- better textures
- glitches are fixed
- Only button in last room will enable spawn kill (so all players have more time to complete this map)
- This time no irritating drugs and movement buttons
- and maybe some levels are a little bit easier I have used similiar textures from CS:S and non-original Portal-like textures.

Spawns 32. 3 T's, 29 CT's. 
CT's start at spawn with knives and have to run to the 
towers where the T's are, by hiding behind walls and 
dodging bullets from snipers. If you are lucky enough to make it 
across, go into the teleport, knife a T, take the sniper, 
then kill the other T's. Terrorists, try to stop the CT's 
from winning by sniping them before they make it across.

Each T has a different gun. If you are facing the towers, the left tower has an awp, the middle has an auto sniper, and the right has a scout. In the CT spawn, you can risk spending time to go through a mini jump obsatcle to get a smoke grenade and a flashbang. Immediately outside the CT spawn, if you turn around and look a little up, there is another mini jump obstacle to complete to get a deagle. The catch is the T's can snipe you, so be careful!

Fun for 20-30 minutes.

You start with 1 hp and get a knife and a smoke, if you miss on the smoke, you've got to go and knife 'em. The sides are blocked, you can throw smokes trough 'em, but you cannot run trough 'em. You've got to go trough the middle to get to the other side. Have fun. :)

MINIGAME_SMOKEWARS_UNREAL 4 Fragxl.com community with love MAP FEATURES: [+] FragXL.com stuff [+] 2 Extra HP [+] Smoke recharger [+] Anti-smoke [+] "Smooth curvez" [+] Music [+] Limited time [+] More, more & more... I really hope you like this map, play it and enjoy it. If you find out a bug please contact me so I can correct it. Thanks to all the FRAGXL.com crew for their ideas and motivation.

Just some quick work. Try and kill the other team with smokegrenades. You start with 4 hp. Get smokegrenades and flashbangs from the vending machines. There is a known bug where you get "stuck" with a smokegrenade (happens when you stand on another grenade while throwing). To avoid it get a flashbang from one of the hallways

My new smokenade dodgeball mini game map! You spawn with 1hp and a smokenade. If you hit someone directly with a smokenade or a flashbang, it does 1 damage so the idea is to literally play dodgeball. Besides the smokenade you start with you get them at the 11 grenade symbols around the map. The the floating text that says +1hp will set your health to 2 so that it takes 2 smokenades to kill you. There are only 2 of these on the map and each one can only be used once per round. All glitches from the last version have been fixed, the smokenades now disappear when they fall to the bottom of the map and if you walk over a nade symbol while already having one equipped, the smokenade will disappear after 1 second. 

I changed the logic on how the smokenade is spawned and then equiped to you with a complicated system that enables an output to be possible that kills a nade that is spawned but not picked up after 1 second. The engine glitch that occurred when you throw a smokenade and walk over one of the symbols while the throwing animation is still going on causing you to not be able to pick anymore up and not throw the one you have is fixed. I put a delay on the grenade equip and a weapon strip around the trigger so that it ends the animation immediately allowing you to pick up another. Nothing short of brilliant.

This map should be pretty self explanatory, pick up smokegrenades, throw smokegrenades, hopefully make contact. I was mainly hoping to try out a new form of gameplay with this map and i think i might of acheived this. the map overall is pretty good not complicated but smooth and fine enough to not strain the eyes, hopefully i made it light enough.. 

The game should begin with the two teams spawning on either ends and both sets of players losing 99HP each, this is to ensure that the smokenade will kill on first contact. the Floor of the level should be noted that it will not Bounce the nades as it would create to much of a distortion and would end up being difficult for those to throw nades through the smoke. This version comes with knifes as i found out that there will be problems with just smokenades spawning so i decided to put in knive's as well. 

I tested this with my friend's on LAN and i found it to be really good a bit daunting and difficult at first but once you get used to the nades physics it turns out really fun.:D 

I don't real wan't to many comments on the actual level design as i spent about 60% of the map on how the actual nades will spawn and be equally distributed through out the map. 

I would love for more people to take on the idea and test it out for themselves because that would be great to see more user created files of smokefight going round.:D. 

I'm Putting the map in a Beta Stage as there might be a few problem's with the actual map itself but i did test it and didn't see many problems come up. so i would like to get feedback with that.

_aChangeLog.text: ladder in m4 secret is back, sorry about that

Changed secret AWPs to Scouts, gave them no extra ammo

Moved more outside CT spawns to the pool
Added ladders to the pool, easier to get out

_sText:
It's mg_smee_tower_fix2 by Mathijs. But better. At first I wanted to fix the elevator, but eventually I worked on revamping most of the map.

Changes

  • Two secret AWPs with trails, and one MP5.
  • Brushwork cleaned up a bit with some optimizations that may make the map run a bit better for some people.
  • Lots of texture changes. Now uses militia skybox.
  • Lighting, shadows...
  • Each team now has 32 spawnpoints (previously 25). 7 CT spawns were moved to the pool.
  • Small ladder added behind the base of the tower.
  • Some boxes added to the roof, and a vending machine added to the lounge room (under vent).
  • Alignment of the ladder from T spawn to roof was fixed.
  • (hopefully) blocked some surf spots.
  • Elevator cleaned up and correctly aligned with the floors. There's also some elevator music and a vent on the ceiling. Elevator buttons now glow, too.
  • Weapon trails look smoother.
  • Pool stairs changed.
  • Cubemaps.
  • Vent cover is now transparent.
  • Replaced bottom floor beneath elevator to a player clip, so everything except players will fall through. This means that smoke grenades can't (well, shouldn't be able to) stop the elevator
  • secret game mode :)
  • ...maybe too secret?

Mg_smee_tower_fix.

PLEASE RE-DOWNLOAD IF U HAVE MG_SMEE_TOWER_FIX,
AND DOWNLOAD MG_SMEE_TOWER_FIX2

I'd first like to thank Mathijs, you made a great map and I wouldn't have made it if it weren't for you obviously. This map is mostly for the server I play on, but I decided to open it to the public because why not. I noticed some problems so I changed them.
- I added actual lighting, it completely changes the map turns out
- Removed the ability to camp roof by adding 3rd way on
- Patched some elevator glitches
- Re textured it
- Added bomb sites since I got tired of people just camping the roof
- Added the ability to break open the wall (only nades can open it!!!) at A site so it's a bit easier to retake
- Spawn killing is no longer possible, I removed the outside CT spawns.
-Bomb sites in pool and CT spawn

This map is set in a space theme set on a space station. It's the same old smash but this time i've tried something different. I've made the pillars completely transparent to make it play differently.
